meanings.definition: The state of being adjacent; proximity.
meanings.sent1: The adjacences of the two houses made it easy for the neighbors to chat over the fence.
meanings.sent2: The adjacences of the buildings allowed for easy access between them.
meanings.sent3: The adjacences of the playground and the school created a convenient setup for the children.
meanings.sent4: The adjacences of the puzzle pieces made it simple to fit them together.
meanings.sent5: The adjacences of the shops in the mall made shopping very convenient.

meanings.definition: The act of adjoining or being contiguous.
meanings.sent1: The adjacences of the rooms in the hotel made it easy for guests to move around.
meanings.sent2: The adjacences of the fields allowed for efficient farming practices.
meanings.sent3: The adjacences of the ingredients in the recipe made cooking a breeze.
meanings.sent4: The adjacences of the train cars created a seamless travel experience.
meanings.sent5: The adjacences of the colors in the painting added depth to the artwork.
